tool_description: The Bolt delivery API for placing delivery requests
name: Bolt Delivery
title: Bolt Delivery

api_list.name: New Delivery Order
api_list.description: This endpoint lets you create new delivery requests to the Bolt delivery API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bolt.p.rapidapi.com/new/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bolt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bolt.p.rapidapi.com/new/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bolt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
